rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0001
rows.name: Welcome back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0002
rows.name: So...how's that new left arm feeling?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_JNK0010
rows.name: Reassure

rows.label: xs05140100_SEL0011
rows.name: Check your arm and nod approvingly.

rows.label: xs05140100_JNK0020
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: xs05140100_SEL0021
rows.name: Check your arm and shake your head.

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0003
rows.name: Man, what a relief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0004
rows.name: You're lucky Lin was with us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0005
rows.name:
If she hadn't acted as fast as she did, you might have
bled out entirely. We could have lost your whole unit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0006
rows.name: Aw, it was nothing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Hmm... That's strange.
The analytical scans didn't pick up any major problems.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0008
rows.name:
We know your fluids are circulating properly,
and it looks like you can definitely control your fingers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0009
rows.name: You SHOULD be back to normal...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0010
rows.name:
If Lin says the scans check out, I'm sure it'll be fine.
It can take some time to re-adjust.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0011
rows.name: It's kind of like phantom limb syndrome, just in reverse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0012
rows.name: That must be it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0013
rows.name:
You DID just have the operation...
Sadly, there's nothing I can do to speed up the sync process.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0014
rows.name: Just give it a little time—you'll see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0015
rows.name: Before we go any further, I wanted to apologize.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0016
rows.name: I should've realized you might've forgotten about this, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0017
rows.name:
As you've probably noticed, the body you're inhabiting
is artificial. We call them "mimeosomes."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0018
rows.name: "Mims," for short.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0019
rows.name:
Mimeosomes are designed to mimic
human physiology as much as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0020
rows.name: The whole point is for us to forget about them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0021
rows.name: That way we can still enjoy the things we love—like cooking![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0022
rows.name:
We're all like this—every single crew member
that escaped on the White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0023
rows.name: All of us are mims.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0024
rows.name: But why would friends all become robots?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0025
rows.name: Well, just think about it:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0026
rows.name:
It could've taken decades to find a new planet to call home...
or even centuries. We had no idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0027
rows.name:
Who would want to crew the ship if they knew
they were going to grow old or die along the way?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0028
rows.name: Mmm... Tatsu see Linly point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0029
rows.name:
Our actual bodies are waiting in the Lifehold,
in stasis with all the human passengers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0030
rows.name: We control our mimeosomes remotely from there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0031
rows.name: So you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0032
rows.name:
That's why it's so important for us to find and protect
the Lifehold. Our lives are on the line here, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0033
rows.name:
If the Lifehold were to stop functioning
for any reason while we're still there in stasis...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0034
rows.name:
...Everyone, including every mim in New LA,
would drop dead on the spot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0035
rows.name: That reminds me—something else you should know:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0036
rows.name:
It's possible for us to switch to another mimeosome
if these bodies fail or become too badly damaged.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0037
rows.name:
But the process requires equipment from the Lifehold Core,
the central unit of the whole operation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0038
rows.name:
Meh-meh! So what if Ganglion or big beastie
smash friends' robot mims?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0039
rows.name: We wouldn't be able to come back yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0040
rows.name:
For now, we need to consider these mims
as precious as we would our real, actual bodies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0041
rows.name:
Don't get reckless out there just 'cause you're in a mimeosome.
That's an order, you hear?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0042
rows.name: One last thing...and I need to trust you all to keep this quiet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0043
rows.name:
It's sensitive info, so HQ has only been telling team leaders
about it. We can't have a panic on our hands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0045
rows.name: The readout on BLADE Tower... You've seen it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0046
rows.name:
It's not some kind of special clock or anything like that.
It's a countdown.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0047
rows.name: Big number counts down to what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0048
rows.name: The Lifehold shutting down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0049
rows.name: What?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0050
rows.name:
The Lifehold lost its power source when we lost the
White Whale. It's been running on backup ever since.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0051
rows.name:
We need to locate the Lifehold AND get a power source
in place by the time that percentage reaches zero.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0052
rows.name: And...if we don't?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0053
rows.name: These bodies will no longer sustain us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0054
rows.name: We'll die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0055
rows.name: Not just die, Lin. Die out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0056
rows.name:
It would mean the end of the human race as we know it. 
The end of everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0057
rows.name: Well, on that cheerful note...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0058
rows.name: Okay, Rook.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0058_2
rows.name: You good to go?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0059
rows.name:
Then let's report back to HQ.
I'm sure the Commander will want to hear about this himself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0060
rows.name: Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG9000
rows.name: —Mimeosome Maintenance Center—[ST:wait ]
